history.proof: intros a b l H. inversion H. qsimpl use: ordered_one. qsimpl use: ordered_one. qsimpl use: ordered_one. qsimpl use: ordered_cons,ordered_one. qsimpl use: ordered_cons,ordered_one. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l : list A H : ordered (a :: b :: l) a0, b0 : A l0 : list A H2 : order a b H4 : ordered (b :: l) H0 : a0 = a H1 : b0 = b H3 : l0 = l Unable to unify "ordered [?M1457]" with "ordered (a :: l)".

In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop H : forall a : A, ordered [a] order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l : list A H2 : order a b H4 : ordered (b :: l) Unable to unify "ordered [?M2534]" with "ordered (a :: l)".

In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop H0 : forall a : A, ordered [a] order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l : list A H2 : order a b H4 : ordered (b :: l) Unable to unify "ordered (?M2840 :: ?M2841 :: ?M2842)" with "ordered (a :: l)".
The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop H1 : forall a : A, ordered [a] H : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l) order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c a, b : A l : list A H2 : order a b H4 : ordered (b :: l) Unable to unify "order a b" with "ordered (a :: l)".

original: intros a b l H. inversion H. apply ordered_one. inversion H1. apply ordered_one. apply ordered_cons. apply H0. apply H2.
